an7.48:1.1: “Sattima, bhikkhave, sanna bhavita bahulikata mahapphala honti mahanisamsa amatogadha amatapariyosana.
an7.48:2.2: Asubhasanna, maranasanna, ahare patikulasanna, sabbaloke anabhiratasanna, aniccasanna, anicce dukkhasanna, dukkhe anattasanna.
an7.48:2.3: Ima kho, bhikkhave, satta sanna bhavita bahulikata mahapphala honti mahanisamsa amatogadha amatapariyosana”ti.
